tasks.label: Run Main (skip login)
args: $ErrorActionPreference = 'Stop'; Set-Location '${workspaceFolder}'; $repo = Join-Path $env:USERPROFILE '.m2\repository'; $gson = Join-Path $repo 'com\google\code\gson\gson\2.10.1\gson-2.10.1.jar'; $flatlaf = Join-Path $repo 'com\formdev\flatlaf\3.2.5\flatlaf-3.2.5.jar'; if (!(Test-Path $gson) -or !(Test-Path $flatlaf)) { Write-Error 'Missing dependency jars. Run: mvn dependency:go-offline (or mvn test) to download.'; exit 1 }; $classes = if (Test-Path 'out\com\hotel\Main.class') { 'out' } elseif (Test-Path 'target\classes\com\hotel\Main.class') { 'target\classes' } else { Write-Error 'No compiled classes found. Build the project first (Maven or VS Code Java build).'; exit 1 }; $cp =
